Package vistra.framework.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBidirectIterator<E>
    A bidirectional iterator interface.
    ICommand
    A command interface.

    A command handler interface (macro command).

    A state interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractState
    An abstract state with default empty implementation on 'do'-methods.
    Convert
    A utility class serving with static methods only.
    ImmutableBidirectIterator<E>
    A bidirectional iterator over a list, immutable.
